title: Olive Oil Roasted Root Vegetables
ingredients: ['1 butternut squash, peeled, seeded and cut into 2.5cm cubes', '3 carrots, cut into 2.5cm pieces', '1 large sweet potato, cut into 2.5cm cubes', '1 swede, peeled and cut into 2.5cm cubes', '3 parsnips, peeled and cubed', '3 turnips, peeled and cut into 2.5cm cubes', '4 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', 'sea salt and pepper to taste']
